parameters.query: INSERT INTO suno_bgm_generation_jobs (id, status, genre, mood, tempo, duration_seconds, total_tracks, custom_prompt, channel_id, created_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), 'processing', $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, NOW()) RETURNING id

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ prompt: $json.prompt, duration: $node['ğŸ”§ åˆæœŸåŒ–'].json.duration_seconds, instrumental: true }) }}

parameters.query: UPDATE suno_bgm_generation_jobs SET generated_count = generated_count + 1, output_urls = COALESCE(output_urls, '[]'::jsonb) || to_jsonb($2::text), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $1
